src_original: śakyo mayā prāptuṃ nirodho mārgaś cotpādayitum iti //  ratnāni trīṇi buddhadharmasaṅghāḥ /  durlabhatvān mahārghatvāt prītikaratvād upakārakaratvād amānuṣādyupaghātapratipakṣatvāc ca ratnānīva ratnāni /
tatra durlabhatvaṃ -- bhavabhogeṣv asaktaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair bodhisattvair nairantaryeṇa bodhisambhāreṣu pravartamānais tribhiḥ kalpāsaṅkhyeyair buddhatvaṃ prāpyata iti durlabham /
buddhotpādasya ca durlabhatvād dharmasaṅgharatnayor api durlabhatvaṃ buddhotpādapratibaddhatvāt /
saṅgharatnam api sāṃsārikaphalanirvartakaviśiṣṭābhyāṃ puṇyajñānābhyāṃ prāpyata iti mahārgham /
